attributes.action:
UK Government should deny PM Modi
Entry Visa.
attributes.background: PM Modi must be held responsible for killings of thousands of Muslims when he was Chief Minister of Gujrat India.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government could do. Heads of State are exempt from immigration controls. You can find more information here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/263324/section1__1_.pdf
